text:
Trial jurors shall receive for each day's attendance in the Superior and Municipal Courts, in both civil and criminal cases, the fee of $10. In addition, trial jurors shall be reimbursed at the rate of $1.50 for every 10 miles, or fraction thereof, actually traveled from the residence of the juror in attending court as a juror, in going only. 
(Added by Ord. 514-84, App. 12/21/84)
